com.mcc.ul
Class BthConfig

java.lang.Object
  com.mcc.ul.BthConfig

public class BthConfig
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods to get or set configuration of a BlueTooth DAQ device. To create an instance of this class, call the getBthConfig() method of the DaqDeviceConfig class.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getPairingCode()
          Returns the code required to initially pair a Bluetooth device with an Android host device such as a tablet or smartphone.

          Sets the code used to initially pair a Bluetooth device with an Android host device such as a tablet or smartphone.

Method Detail

setPairingCode

public void setPairingCode(java.lang.String paringCode)
                    throws ULException
Sets the code used to initially pair a Bluetooth device with an Android host device such as a tablet or smartphone. This value is set to 0000 by default.

Parameters:
paringCode - Pairing code
Throws:
ULException

                                throws ULException
Returns the code required to initially pair a Bluetooth device with an Android host device such as a tablet or smartphone.

Throws:
